Tutoring
Near Me

If you are seeking “tutoring near me”, Queen Elizabeth Academy is the right place. We offer tutoring over 20 cities across Canada, teaching live virtually. Queen Elizabeth Academy has 9 years of track record of providing quality tutoring, with our students entering top universities, including Waterloo, Queen’s, Western, Laurier and McGill.

Find a tutor near me

Welcome to Queen Elizabeth Academy, a premier private tutoring school focuses on providing high quality education to our students, those who are trying to find a tutor near them.

For them, finding a good tutor “near me” is important because of convenience, and QEA offers high quality tutoring program to over 20 cities across Canada, whether you live in Toronto, Ottawa or Calgary.

You can always benefit from our high quality tutoring, via our online platform with live teaching.

 

The Queen Elizabeth Standard
of Excellence

Queen Elizabeth Academy has a strong tradition of providing high-quality education to students in Toronto. For students who need tutoring in Toronto, we build the foundation of the student, not quick fix, to nurture their long term success.

Over the past 9 years, we worked with thousands of students in Ontario, including Toronto, many of whom were admitted to top universities: Waterloo, Queen’s, Western, Laurier, and McGill, with scholarships from $2,000 to $23,000.

Many of our alumni have entered medical schools, MA, PhD or employed by global firms such as KPMG and Fidelity Investments.

Subject areas for tutoring near me

MHF4U Advanced Functions course

Advanced Functions course is an important course for university admission and preparing for Calculus.

MCV4U Calculus course

Calculus is a main course for students applying for engineering, commerce and science for university. It builds an important foundation for first year.

MCR3U Math 11 course

Math 11 is an important foundation course leading up to Grade 12 Math. Students learn key skills such as graphing and algebra in this course.

SCH4U Chemistry 12 course

Chemistry 12 is critical for students applying to pre-med, chemistry or engineering. It is one of the toughest high school courses with complex application, situation based problems.

SCH3U Chemistry 11 course

Chemistry 11 is an important foundation course for grade 12 chemistry. The challenge for this course is that it combines concepts with math calculations.

SPH4U Physics 12 course

Physics 12 is a critical course for students applying to engineering for university. The key challenges are the abstract concepts and complicated application problems.

SPH3U Physics 11 course

Physics 11 is foundation course for physics 12. Students found physics 11 challenging because of the nature of the word problems and problem solving techniques they have to master.

ENG3U English 11 and ENG4U English 12 course

English 11 and 12 are both heavy in terms of work load and focus on advanced literature. The key to succeed is to learn essay writing and critical thinking, which the student will get marked heavily on. We teach these two important skills in our English tutoring program.

FAQ related to finding tutoring services near me

How much does it cost to hire a tutor near me in 2021?

The price for tutoring at Queen Elizabeth Academy depends on your age and subject you need to cover. You can be rest assured that we give our best effort and our tutoring team are expertise in the area that you get help on: physics, chemistry, biology, math and English. We never give a physics specialist to tutor biology, for example, because it won’t be effective as the thinking and learning process is very different.

How can I find a good tutor near me?

Come to Queen Elizabeth Academy! We provide tutoring services to over 20+ cities across Canada. Many of our students have successfully entered top universities: Waterloo, Queen’s, Western, Laurier, UBC, and McGill.

Why should I take private lessons?

If you are in high school, group lessons are not effective. You just won’t get the lessons and attention tailored to your needs. Oftentimes if you pay for an hour for a group lesson, you share with other people and end up getting may 15-20 minutes of lesson time. For high school, all the teachers are different and the curriculum is taught in slightly different order. We provide lesson based tutoring based on what you learn from school during that week.

What subject can the tutor cover?

Queen Elizabeth Academy has over 25 tutors in our team, each specialized in their subject area. We can cover Math, Chemistry, Biology, Physics, English from grade 5 to 12, up to university level.

How can I prepare for my lesson before the tutoring session?

You won’t need to! All we need to know is what unit / chapter you learn in school, and we will deliver the lesson to you, well explained, and then go through practice problems, step by step.

More FAQ and Tips on Tutoring Near Me

How do you know if you need a tutor?

When you fall behind, many students have a tendency to ignore and wait. You shouldn’t do that, because math and science are cumulative. One unit is built upon another. If your foundation have gaps, it will keep appearing on your solution and you will lose marks throughout. In many case, it looks like you make careless errors, but in reality it is foundation issues. You need a tutor to build good foundation, to teach you and review the lessons, and provide you with extra practices. We offer the full package to ensure that you are on track. Finding “tutoring near me” may be challenging, but our tutoring program is the best (we are proud of it) and have a strong track record of success.

What are the benefits of using a Tutor?

In a high school settings, when there are 30+ students, often times your teacher just don’t have enough time to take care of every student, in a personalized manner. QEA offers individualized lessons tailored to your weakness, provide you with extra practice, mock test and mock exams (available to certain subjects). We help you to build a good foundation, so that you will succeed long term. Our tutors are all high academic achievers, they serve as a role model for our students. Finding a “tutoring near me” is challenging, but our tutoring team is expert in their area and can support you to achieve your academic goals.

What area can the tutor address?

We cover all subjects, elementary to high school to university. Math, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, English, Accounting. If you need to find a tutoring near me, you found the right place! We provide good notes and materials for our students to succeed, teaching them important studying and test writing strategies in addition to the subject on hand.
